Header: SFHQ-Mullaittivu Troops Receive Explore on Vocational Training
Content: In order to release potential pensioners of the Army as professionally-qualified personnel to the society, an educative lecture on Vocational Training was conducted at the Security Force Headquarters - Mullaittivu (SFHQ-MLT) lecture hall on Tuesday (7) under the close supervision of Major General Dushyantha Rajaguru, Commander, Security Forces -Mullaittivu. This initiative was launched according to a concept of the Commander of the Army in order to produce qualified professional personnel to the society upon retirement. A total of 20 Officers and 110 Other Ranks took part in the educative programme, conducted by Lieutenant Colonel V.D.S Perera, Commanding Officer, Sri Lanka Army Vocational Training Centre at Kalaoya.
